channel.title: jira.namics.com
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5271] FF-Tracking for one search result
item.description:
Hallo Raphael

Im September-Report haben wir extrem viele Artikelnummern-Suchen mit Zero-Click-Through Rate. Wenn ich mir die Anzahl so ansehe und nach ein paar Stichproben, sieht es danach aus, als ob es alle Artikelnummern-Suchen wären.

Kann es sein, dass keine Klicks mehr getrackt werden, wenn der Kunde direkt auf der Produktdetailseite landet? Falls ja, sollten wir das beheben, da dies eine wichtige Kennzahl ist, mit der wir arbeiten, die wir auch für Suchen mit nur einem Resultat haben sollten. Die Artikelnummernsuchen ohne Click-Through-Value geben ausserdem wichtige Hinweise für das PM, wo es Handlungsbedarf gibt.

Kannst du dir das bitte mal anschauen?

Danke & Grüsse
Daniela

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: As discussed with Raphael, one bit of the tracking was not changed.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5266] Incorrect behaviour on Redeem/Relase voucher when pressing RETURN Key
item.description:
The voucher redeem action is not triggered in the right way when pressing Return key.

Please check the ticket DISTRELEC-5229 for all the details.

At the moment the voucher actions are fully working when clicking with mouse on the buttons.
But when clicking the return key there are problems.
item.environment: all (test locally with last svn version)
item.summary: Incorrect behaviour on Redeem/Relase voucher when pressing RETURN Key

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Please test after the next deployment
Thanks!

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5235] Can not save an article in an other shopping list
item.description:

Fact:

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5137] New Customer Registration Email (text & visuals change)
item.description:
1. Replace existing with new text:

Danke für Ihre Online Registrierung

Sehr geehrter Kunde

Mit freundlichen Grüssen
Ihr Distrelec Online-Team

2. Make Button bigger.
item.summary: New Customer Registration Email (text & visuals change)

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

Sorry, images have already been corrected by us in the CMS
We only need the text and a Bigger button/font centered Call-to-action

Please test after the next deployment
Thanks!
Ruben

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5082] SAP Framework with IE11 & IE10 // Layout Issue
item.description:
There is still a compatibility issue with our web site.
Customer is using an OCI Interface with IE11.

IE 9 works fine.
item.summary: SAP Framework with IE11 & IE10 // Layout Issue

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hey Florian,

Could you please provide me some more information and an oci link where I can see the problem?

Thanks and BR, Jan

Hi Jan,
This is the only screenshot I have.
But this is how our web shops look like for a few OCI customers with IE11.
https://test.distrelec.ch/ociEntry?username=webmaster@distrelec.com&password=123456&hook_url=http://q08.elfa.se:50000/elfa3/catalogdb/DisplayParametersServlet&oci_version=4.0

Today I had another customer on the phone.

  • She had IE9 with the SAP SRM Framework and the Shop looked good after the last compatibility modification from our side
  • Now she is using IE 10 and the shop looks good after entering the OCI URL directly into the browser. But if she uses the SAP SRM Framework with IE (without compability mode) the shop is totally scrambled (screenshots).

Discussed with Jan:
In order to analyze and fix this issue, he needs access to a computer where the problem occurs. Can this be organized in any way?

Hi Florian,

Meanwhile I had a Remote Session with Corine Waldispuehl from Roche. I was able to see the Distrelec OCI Page through their ERP Tool. The Distrelec Shop is getting called with this url:

https://www.distrelec.ch/ociEntry?HOOK_URL=https%3A%2F%2Fgepscatalog.roche.com%2FJPBC%2FExtCatHandlerServlet.servlet%3FcatId%3D05&http_content_charset=ISO-8859-1&username=roche-ch-ger@oci.distrelec&password=mwiS3vu8&oci_version=4.0

After a OCI user was successfully logged in into the shop, he gets rerouted to the OCI Success page, first with https, then angain rerouted to the none https version of the page. That happens because the whole distrelec shop besides my account pages is non https.

The Problem in IE and also Firefox is, that you cannot load an Iframe with non https content within a page WITH https. For further info see https://blog.mozilla.org/tanvi/2013/04/10/mixed-content-blocking-enabled-in-firefox-23/
Since the ERP Page of Roche is WITH https and the distrelec shop is WITHOUT https, most of the ressources (css, js, images) are getting blocked in IE.

I attached the console output and the network capture from the remote session. In the console output, you can see, that all the ressources are getting blocked.

The next steps would be to switch all Pages to https, as soon as the user is logged in. I briefly talked with Rene Haemmerli about this and he told me, that at some point in the project, they tried to do that, but where running into problems. It is possible though, since we also did it on a different project of namics.

If you have more questions about the remote session, give me a call.

BR Jan
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/18327314/how-to-allow-http-content-within-an-iframe-on-a-https-site

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4684] SEO - "Service Plus" products crawlable by Googlebot - robots.txt to edit & metatag to add
item.description:
Observations :

  • Service plus product are crawlable by google.
    exemple : http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Kennzeichnungsclip-mit-Bezeichnung-gelb%2C-WIC3-0-9-HellermannTyton---561-03101/p/serviceplus/90038672
  • This represent 50% of the url proposed inside sitemaps.
  • This represent (all language included) 600k pages.

Impacts :

  • In SEO, we only provide to the crawler landing page that have ranking strategy and and keywords objectives.
    Google is loosing his time and pollute his index with this pattern of pages.
  • That lead into not crawling the important and relevant pages and finally not be ranked properly inside the search engine result pages.

Demands :

  • Hide this pattern of url from google sight :
    • Replace the entire content of http://www.distrelec.ch/robots.txt by this content : 
      # Allow access to AdsBot
User-agent: AdsBot-Google
User-agent: Mediapartners-Google
User-agent: Googlebot-Image
Disallow:

# Block access to specific groups of pages
User-agent: *
Disallow: /search
Disallow: /checkToggles
Disallow: /cart
Disallow: /checkout
Disallow: /my-account
Disallow: /login
Disallow: /import-tool
Disallow: /support
Disallow: /feedback
Disallow: /medias/sys_master/*.js
Disallow: /_ui/all/cache/*.js
Disallow: //app/etc/local.xml
Disallow: /medias/sys_master/*.gz
Disallow: /gsitemap*.xml.gz
Disallow: */p/serviceplus/*
Disallow: */ServicePlusShop/*
Disallow: /*/p/*/alsoBought*
Disallow: /*/p/*/recommendation*

# Allow search crawlers to discover the sitemap
Sitemap: http://www.distrelec.ch/sitemap_index.xml

# Block BadBot
User-agent: CazoodleBot
User-agent: MJ12bot
User-agent: dotbot/1.0
User-agent: Gigabot
User-agent: admantx
User-agent: Wget
User-agent: semvisuBot
User-agent: Baiduspider
User-agent: SITRIX Crawler
User-agent: BLEXBot
Disallow: /
    • Add inside the html head of every pages of this pattern http://www.distrelec.ch/*/p/serviceplus/* & http://www.distrelec.ch/*/ServicePlusShop/* this meta tag : 
      <meta name="robots" content="noindex,follow,noodp,noydir" />

Checking process :

  • This issue can't be closed without my final live check.
  • Thank you to update the status of the implementation in the comment below.
item.summary: SEO - "Service Plus" products crawlable by Googlebot - robots.txt to edit & metatag to add

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: I did it on Florian and Daniel request.
Just to be sure, you are speaking about the fact that I modified the priority to "Blocker" or something else ?

Ok, we are speaking about the same thing
It's part of a bundle of tiquet which need to be fixed before the distrelec.de rollout.
That's why it's been escalated in "blocker" to have it fixied ASAP in agrement with Daniel and Florian.

When will it be deployed ?
(to check if it worked)
ok, thx.
